name: V
catchPhrase: A revolution without dancing is a revolution not worth having!

name: Han Solo
catchPhrase: Get in there, you big furry oaf! I don't care what you smell!

name: Walter White
catchPhrase: Chemistry is, well technically, chemistry is the study of matter. But I prefer to see it as the study of change.

name: Tyrion Lannister
catchPhrase: That's what I do: I drink and I know things.
